workflow_metadata.name: FU-05 Integration, Validation & Release Preparation
workflow_metadata.description: Integrate new/updated services, validate end-to-end including operational effectiveness, and prepare release.

steps.description: Update integration tests to include new/updated services
Run system graph & architecture validation tools
Validate all contracts, data models, deployment
Execute operational test scenarios to validate feature effectiveness and user value
Conduct user acceptance validation using feature_user_scenarios.md
Measure success criteria defined in feature_success_criteria.md
Update documentation and runbooks as needed
Prepare release notes and migration instructions focusing on user experience
